TopicTitle: My ksp is not saving my game!

Articles.Content: Are gamedata and all, most do not have my games in saves folder, only stock! Help me! 0.25
Wrong section and could you post a pic of your ksp folder

Most likely you have KSP in C:\Program Files

Unless it's the Steam version, copy it to C:\Games

Also, we need your logs, see the stickies.
Okay it's the Steam version, make sure your antivirus is not deleting the saves by white-listing the KSP.exe in your antivirus software.
I use avast, more in 0.24 had the folder yes...
It should be working, have you tried making a quicksave with the F5 key? If yes then it may say what happened in the Alt+F2 log screen.
Quicksave always do, and so well have seen alt + F12

Oh I know, it's Steam, they are in your User folder, not in the KSP folder!

User\applications\Kerbal or something, just do a file search of your system and include hidden files/folders

Aye, sometimes Steam keeps the KSP folder marked Read-Only for some silly reason. You're looking for C:\Users\[YOUR_USERNAME]\AppData\[...]\Kerbal Space Program.

I'm not sure what the whole path is, but from memory it should include a folder called Application Support somewhere in there.

My (Steam) saves are always in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program\saves

They are there for me. Looking at his folders, it looks like KSP is in the Steam folder, not Steam\SteamApps\common
